content: fugly monster version 2 - gomer 5mm hook worsted weight yarn - main color & contrasting color thinner yarn for teeth worked in the round top down belly patch worked in row head/body - 1 chain 7 single_crochet into 2nd chain from hook single_crochet 4 single_crochet 3 into last st continue to other side of chain single_crochet 4 single_crochet 2 into last st 14 2 increase single_crochet 4 increase single_crochet increase single_crochet 4 increase single_crochet 18 3 increase single_crochet 7 increase increase single_crochet 7 increase 22 4 increase single_crochet 10 increase single_crochet 10 24 5-9 single_crochet around 5r of 24 10 single_crochet 4 chain 7 skip 7 single_crochet 13 24 11 single_crochet 4 single_crochet 7 single_crochet 13 24 12-13 single_crochet around 24 stop here - add eyes between rounds 5 & 6 above the ends of the mouth opening inner mouth - contrast color - done in row 1 chain 10 turn single_crochet 9 2-4 chain 1 turn single_crochet 9 fo leave long tail for sewing inner mouth is sewn to inside of head over the mouth hole teeth - 4mm or 3 5mm hook - make 3 1 chain 3 turn slip_stitch 2 chain 1 turn slip_stitch 2 chain 1 turn slip_stitch 2 fo leave tail for sewing sew teeth to inner mouth now continue to main pattern 14 single_crochet 2 increase single_crochet 10 increase single_crochet 10 26 15 single_crochet increase single_crochet 13 increase single_crochet 10 28 16 single_crochet 2 increase single_crochet 14 increase single_crochet 10 30 17 increase single_crochet 4 around 36 18 increase single_crochet 2 around 48 19 increase single_crochet 3 around 60 next round you will create the arm holes 20 single_crochet 5 skip 12 single_crochet 18 skip 12 single_crochet 13 36 21-35 single_crochet around 15r of 36 stuff head & body stop here - flatten body find middle st on back of doll move st marker to this st if needed this now becomes st #1 of leg #1 36 single_crochet into marked st & next 17 18 37 working across body single_crochet into 1st st & next 17 18 38-44 single_crochet around 7r of 18 45 decrease single_crochet around 12 46 decrease around 6 fo close hole stuff rest of body if needed & leg #1 leg #2 - attach with slip_stitch to 1st open st to the left of leg #1 on front of doll 1 chain 1 single_crochet into same as chain & into next 17 18 2 working across body single_crochet into 1st st & next 17 18 3-9 single_crochet around 7r of 18 10 decrease single_crochet around 12 11 decrease around 6 fo leave longer tail close hole stuff leg #2 & rest of body through hole between legs use leftover strand to close up the hole between the legs tuck ends into body arms - make 2 1 single_crochet 6 into magic_ring 2 increase around 12 3 increase single_crochet around 18 4-5 single_crochet around 18 6 single_crochet 2 4dcbobble single_crochet 15 18 7 single_crochet around 18 8 decrease single_crochet
